title: Relates to permitting certain holders of class DJ and class MJ licenses to drive to volunteer fire and ambulance activities
summary: Permits holders of class DJ and class MJ licenses outside of the counties of Nassau and Suffolk, and New York City to drive to volunteer fire and ambulance activities.
